name: Generate Construction File with Cas13 Integration
description: Generates a construction file for RNA targeting using Cas13 in an insect species. It integrates organism-specific Cas13 variant selection, crRNA design, and RNA secondary structure analysis.

inputs.name: organism_name
inputs.description: The name of the insect species for which the construction file is being created.

inputs.name: rna_sequence
inputs.description: The RNA sequence to be targeted by Cas13.

outputs.description: A detailed construction file containing steps for RNA targeting using Cas13, including selected Cas13 variant, crRNA design, and RNA secondary structure analysis.
